page.title: 02OUR FRIEND THE RECTOR
page.content: Our Rector comes from Market Drayton to Adderley church ST.Peters. He also comes to our school. He tells us tales about his family and God. Sometimes he is funny he has a beard and glasses and has a bald patch on his head. He has a young family and he has only just returned from Zimbabwe Africa. He is a friendly Rector and comes to see people when they are lonely or upset. When he has taken our assembly at school every Tuesday he looks at our work and asks us about it. He is also the chairman of the school Governors thats why he looks at our work. He's been here for three years. He said that more people come to church in the morning services. We like our Rector and we hope he will stay.
